General.Name: Mohit Industries Limited
General.Description: Mohit Industries Limited engages in manufacturing texturized yarn from partially oriented yarn and weaving yarn to grey cloth in India. It offers yarn, grey, and fabric products. The company also exports its products to West and South East Asia, the United Kingdom, Italy, Spain, Germany, Mexico, Thailand, Peru, Bangladesh, South Africa, Egypt, Brazil, Colombia, Guatemala, Vietnam, Indonesia, Bulgaria, Uzbekistan, Chili, and internationally. The company was incorporated in 1991 and is headquartered in Surat, India.
General.Address: A/601-B, International Trade Centre, Surat, India, 395002
